Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.jsonrpc.client.Client
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InfoClient, MusicClient

    public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract super class of all (media) clients.

    • Method Detail

      • getCover

        protected Bitmap getCover(INotifiableManager manager,
              ICoverArt cover,
              int size,
              java.lang.String url,
              java.lang.String fallbackUrl)
        Downloads a cover. First, only boundaries are downloaded in order to determine the sample size. Setting sample size > 1 will do two things:
        1. Only a fragment of the total size will be downloaded
        2. Resizing will be smooth and not pixelated as before
        The returned size is the next bigger (but smaller than the double) size of the original image.
        Parameters:
        manager - Postback manager
        cover - Cover object
        size - Minmal size to pre-resize to.
        url - URL to primary cover
        fallbackUrl - URL to fallback cover
        Returns:
        Bitmap

      • prefetch

        private BitmapFactory.Options prefetch(INotifiableManager manager,
                             java.lang.String url,
                             int size,
                             int mediaType)

      • blowup

        private Bitmap blowup(Bitmap source)
        Doubles the size of a bitmap and re-reads it with samplesize 2. I've found no other way to smoothely resize images with samplesize = 1.
        Parameters:
        source -
        Returns:
